thread.title: Teen creates apps to help people with special needs
thread.title_full: Teen creates apps to help people with special needs

author: Pamela McCabe
title: Teen creates apps to help people with special needs

persons.name: news-press andrew west/the news-press johnny ciocca

text: Pamela McCabe, USA TODAY Tuesday, March 21, 2017 Credit: Andrew West/The News-Press, Andrew West/The News-Press Andrew West/The News-Press Johnny Ciocca, 17,left, a junior at Estero High School, has written over 30 apps in the last several years. He specializes in apps that help families with children who have special needs connect socially and improve their lives. On the right is his older brother, Christian, who has Down Syndrome. Johnny Ciocca, 17,left, a junior at Estero High School has written over 30 apps in the last several years. He specializes in apps that help families with children who have special needs connect socially and improve thier lives. On the right is his older brother, Christian, who has Down Syndrome.
